short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Chrome extension to enhance your Reddit experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filter posts by KeyWord in Title, Post Content or Both.
Highlight better already visited posts.
Manage Multiple Accounts with a single Click! Save a session once and load it, simple!
More (Suggest)
In Active Development.
Compatible with re-design version only.
Join our communities to request features and provide feedback:
https://www.reddit.com/r/BetteritExtension/
https://discord.gg/7px3gYypdF
I will implement all of your suggestions!
